content:
Hi @Sandra Vance or @Mary Ann Boyle (I assume =). I didn't realize I needed to schedule the "open" session times for the track; in the past there was always the general track session and the schedule was for the breakouts. Is there a way to add that to the Subscriptions track?
Thanks!
Hello @Gino Canessa. If you add them to confluence here, https://confluence.hl7.org/display/FHIR/Connectathon+Session+Capture, i can update Whova with it correctly
or you can do adhoc meet-ups
Thanks @Mary Ann Boyle I've added them now. Appreciate it!
@Gino Canessa my pleasure. You should see them all in whova now
@Mary Ann Boyle , yes - thank you!
@Yan Heras @Rob Reynolds in DEQM IG session, but no track lead currently
we all just left the session. I asked them all to check your confluence pages for the next sessions
@Mary Ann Boyle The DEQM IG session is going. We are using the Clinical Reasoning Track zoom for all DEQM/GIC track sessions
@Mary Ann Boyle Is this an issue in Whova? can we fix that?
yes. there were 7 people on the zoom assigned to DEQM. I had no idea you all were not using it.
@Yan Heras are we sure that clinical reasoning does not have a session going at the same time?

I told Sandy before the Connectathon that we will only be using the GIC zoom for the kickoff on 5/7, then we will be using the same Clinical Reasoning Track zoom for all our sessions, since we have integrated our schedules with theirs, just like the January Connectathon
I don't think i got that note. = ) I will update all of your sessions now
Thank you!! Thanks for letting me know, I didn't even know, since I joined Zoom directly and we have over 30 participants
If you update the DEQM IG session link in Whova right now, will then people be able to join?
yes
I did tell them to check the confluence page too for any notes for changes
we will have this updated pretty quickly
Thank you!
The session is being recorded. Also the testing session right before this is also recorded.
fabulous
they are all updated too
i will be sure the recordings get posted to both
Thank you so much @Mary Ann Boyle !
I updated the track confluence page with a note about this.
great. they are covered now.

Gino Canessa said:

Hi Sandra Vance or Mary Ann Boyle (I assume =). I didn't realize I needed to schedule the "open" session times for the track; in the past there was always the general track session and the schedule was for the breakouts. Is there a way to add that to the Subscriptions track?
Thanks!

Hi Gino - you can add sessions to your track on this session capture form in confluence: https://confluence.hl7.org/display/FHIR/Connectathon+Session+Capture

Gino Canessa said:

Hi Sandra Vance or Mary Ann Boyle (I assume =). I didn't realize I needed to schedule the "open" session times for the track; in the past there was always the general track session and the schedule was for the breakouts. Is there a way to add that to the Subscriptions track?
Thanks!

https://confluence.hl7.org/display/FHIR/Connectathon+Session+Capture

Sandra Vance said:

Gino Canessa said:

Hi Sandra Vance or Mary Ann Boyle (I assume =). I didn't realize I needed to schedule the "open" session times for the track; in the past there was always the general track session and the schedule was for the breakouts. Is there a way to add that to the Subscriptions track?
Thanks!

Hi Gino - you can add sessions to your track on this session capture form in confluence: https://confluence.hl7.org/display/FHIR/Connectathon+Session+Capture

we took care of this Sandy, thank you

@Sandra Vance hi, we added a session for this afternoon in the session capture page. Is there a way to tag it for two different tracks, both SMART Health Cards and IPS? We're collaborating on a session.

Neelima Karipineni said:

Sandra Vance hi, we added a session for this afternoon in the session capture page. Is there a way to tag it for two different tracks, both SMART Health Cards and IPS? We're collaborating on a session.

Yes we'll add it now.

Neelima Karipineni said:

Sandra Vance hi, we added a session for this afternoon in the session capture page. Is there a way to tag it for two different tracks, both SMART Health Cards and IPS? We're collaborating on a session.

It is on the SMART Health Cards zoom but tagged as both.
Hi, have added another session in Confluence that we'd like listed under both SMART Health Cards and IPS tracks for this afternoon. Thanks!
i believe i see it. Will add what just came through
@Neelima Karipineni all set.
